summary: An ordinance providing for the construction of watermains in 17th Avenue Northwest between West 96th and 97th Streets, in 21st Avenue Northwest from West 97th Street to 100 feet north of West 98th Northwest and West 96th Street from 15th Avenue Northwest to 21st Avenue Northwest; making an appropriation from the surplus in the Water Fund therefor and providing for repayment of construction costs by users of water.
